physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between Reginald George Evelyn William Alban, Political Agent, Bahrain, and Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, regarding a list of foreign employees within the Bahrain Government. The list is not present in the file.Folio 2 is internal office notes.
